mapper.select: SELECT ROUT.ROUT_ID AS ROUT_ID , CONCAT(SUBSTRING(DATE_FORMAT(PUB_DATE, '%Y%m%d'), 3), PUB_SEQ) AS VERSION , LPAD(REPLACE(SHORT_ROUT_NM, '-', 0), 6, 0) AS MNG_NAME , SUBSTRING(DL_CD.DL_CD_NM, 1, 1) AS UP_DOWN , WAY_INFO , DIR_INFO , CONCAT(ROUT.ROUT_ID, '_', CONCAT(SUBSTRING(DATE_FORMAT(PUB_DATE, '%Y%m%d'), 3), PUB_SEQ), '_', LPAD(REPLACE(SHORT_ROUT_NM, '-', 0), 6, 0), '_', SUBSTRING(DL_CD.DL_CD_NM, 1, 1), '_', WAY_INFO, '_', DIR_INFO, '.csv') AS FILENAME FROM BM_ROUT_INFO ROUT LEFT JOIN BM_ROUT_NODE_INFO NODE ON ROUT.ROUT_ID = NODE.ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'UPDOWN_FLAG') DL_CD ON ROUT.USER_WAY_DIV = DL_CD.NUM_VAL4 GROUP BY ROUT.ROUT_ID HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * , IF(PUB_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), 'TRUE', 'FALSE') AS FLAG FROM BM_ROUT_INFO WHERE ROUT_ID = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE BM_ROUT_INFO SET PUB_DATE = SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), 3) , PUB_SEQ = '00' WHERE ROUT_ID = #{value}
UPDATE BM_ROUT_INFO SET PUB_DATE = SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), 3) , PUB_SEQ = PUB_SEQ + 1 WHERE ROUT_ID = #{value}
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(PUB_DATE, '%Y%m%d'), 3), PUB_SEQ) FROM BM_ROUT_INFO WHERE ROUT_ID = #{value}

SELECT CONCAT(ROUT_ID, '.csv') AS FILE_NAME , CONCAT(SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(PUB_DATE, '%Y%m%d'), 3), PUB_SEQ) AS ROUT_VERSION , DVC_NAME AS ROUT_NO , CONCAT(ROUT_NM, "_" , DLCD.DL_CD_NM, "_", WAY_INFO, "_", DIR_INFO) AS ROUT_NM_KO , CONCAT(ROUT_NM, "_" , DLCD.DL_CD_NM, "_", WAY_INFO, "_", DIR_INFO) AS ROUT_NM_EN FROM BM_ROUT_INFO ROUT LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DLCD ON DLCD.CO_CD = 'UPDOWN_FLAG' AND ROUT.USER_WAY_DIV = DLCD.TXT_VAL1 WHERE ROUT_ID = #{value}
SELECT DISTINCT NODE_ID AS NODE_ID , NODE_NM AS NODE_NAME , '30' AS 'RANGE' , TRUNCATE(LONGI, 6) AS X , TRUNCATE(LATI, 6) AS Y FROM BM_ROUT_NODE_INFO WHERE NODE_TYPE = '30'

SELECT DISTINCT STA.STA_ID AS NODE_ID , IF(NM.KR_NM IS NULL || NM.KR_NM = '', STA.STA_NM, NM.KR_NM) AS NODE_NM , '1' AS 'NODE_TYPE' , '30' AS 'RANGE' , TRUNCATE(LONGI, 6) AS X , TRUNCATE(LATI, 6) AS Y , NM.EN_NM AS NODE_ENAME FROM BM_STA_INFO STA LEFT JOIN BM_STA_NM_INFO NM ON STA.STA_ID = NM.STA_ID
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT ORGA_ID AS NODE_ID , ORGA_NM AS NODE_NM , '898' AS 'NODE_TYPE' , '30' AS 'RANGE' , TRUNCATE(LONGI, 6) AS X , TRUNCATE(LATI, 6) AS Y , NULL AS NODE_ENAME FROM BM_VOC_ORGA

SELECT INFO.ROUT_ID AS ROUT_ID FROM BM_ROUT_INFO INFO LEFT JOIN (SELECT ROUT_ID , COUNT(*) AS 'CNT' FROM BM_ROUT_NODE_INFO GROUP BY ROUT_ID) NODE ON INFO.ROUT_ID = NODE.ROUT_ID WHERE NODE.CNT IS NOT NULL
SELECT NODE_ID AS NODE_ID FROM BM_ROUT_NODE_INFO WHERE ROUT_ID = #{value} ORDER BY SEQ
SELECT ORGA_ID AS orgaId , ROUT_ID AS routId FROM BM_VOC_ORGA WHERE ROUT_ID = #{routId}

SELECT O.VOC_ID , O.SEQ , CAST(D.NUM_VAL4 AS INTEGER) AS VOC_CODE , V.PLAY_TYPE , DATE_FORMAT(V.PLAY_ST_DATE, '%Y%m%d') AS PLAY_ST_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(V.PLAY_ED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') AS PLAY_ED_DATE , IFNULL(V.SCR_TXT, '') AS SCR_TXT , IFNULL(V.SCR_TXT_EN, '') AS SCR_TXT_EN
FROM BM_VOC_ORGA_LIST O LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_VOC_INFO V ON O.VOC_ID = V.VOC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO D ON V.VOC_DIV = D.DL_CD AND D.CO_CD = 'VOC_DIV' WHERE O.ORGA_ID = #{orgaId} AND V.PLAY_ED_DATE >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY O.SEQ
